[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [ContextMenuRegistry](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.md) &gt; [getContextMenuOptions](./blockly.contextmenuregistry.getcontextmenuoptions.md)

## ContextMenuRegistry.getContextMenuOptions() method

Gets the valid context menu options for the given scope. Options are only included if the preconditionFn shows they should not be hidden.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getContextMenuOptions(scope: Scope, menuOpenEvent: Event): ContextMenuOption[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | Scope | Current scope of context menu (i.e., the exact workspace or block being clicked on). |
|  menuOpenEvent | Event | Event that caused the menu to open. |

**Returns:**

ContextMenuOption\[\]

the list of ContextMenuOptions
